title: 'Size is small not xl'

title: 'Total waste!!! Top layer comes out after wearing it for an hour'
body: After 2-3 hours of wearing, the top layer of the pad is coming out and all the inner sheet are falling while going to Loo. I always used 'stayfree all night ultra dry max' which are very good. So I bought this one, but I'm disappointed with the adhesion quality.  Absorption is also not good.  I don't recommend to buy this particular item.

title: 'Quality of the pads is not like before'
body: 'The stayfree pads have become thinner easy to wear and comfortable. But maybe not be good for heavy days. Good for light and last few days. The scent is pleasant and feels very comfortable. Good in the price range.'
